statements: SELECT * FROM referral_links ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT referral_url, commission_amount FROM referral_links WHERE affiliate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT referral_url FROM referral_links WHERE commission_amount > 100.00;
SELECT affiliate_id, referral_date FROM referral_links WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' AND referral_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM referral_links LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE affiliate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT referral_url, commission_amount FROM referral_links WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY commission_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(commission_amount) AS average_commission FROM referral_links GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT affiliate_id, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM referral_links GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_referrals DESC;
SELECT * FROM referral_links;
SELECT referral_link, affiliate_id FROM referral_links WHERE link_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_commissions ORDER BY commission_date DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, commission_amount FROM affiliate_commissions WHERE commission_amount > 100;
SELECT referral_link FROM referral_links WHERE affiliate_id = 5;
SELECT referral_link FROM referral_links WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE link_id = (SELECT MAX(link_id) FROM referral_links);
SELECT referral_link FROM referral_links ORDER BY link_id DESC;
SELECT commission_id, commission_amount FROM affiliate_commissions WHERE affiliate_id = 2 ORDER BY commission_date DESC;
SELECT referral_link, commission_amount FROM referral_links l JOIN affiliate_commissions c ON l.affiliate_id = c.affiliate_id WHERE c.commission_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM referral_links;
SELECT id, link FROM referral_links ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, COUNT(*) FROM referral_links GROUP BY affiliate_id;
SELECT * FROM commissions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, affiliate_id, total_amount FROM payouts ORDER BY paid_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT affiliate_id, link FROM referral_links WHERE clicks < 50 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(amount) AS total_commissions FROM commissions GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING total_commissions > 1000;
SELECT affiliate_id, status FROM commissions WHERE amount > 500 AND status = 'pending';
SELECT affiliate_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_payout FROM payouts;
SELECT * FROM referral_links;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, product_id, commission_amount FROM affiliate_commissions WHERE affiliate_id = 1001;
SELECT referral_date, referral_code FROM referral_links WHERE link_id = 2001;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM referral_links WHERE affiliate_id = 100 ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT commission_id, commission_amount FROM affiliate_commissions WHERE commission_amount > 500 ORDER BY commission_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(payout_amount) AS total_payout FROM payouts GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING total_payout > 1000;

SELECT referral_date, product_name, commission_amount FROM referral_links JOIN products ON referral_links.product_id = products.product_id JOIN affiliate_commissions ON referral_links.product_id = affiliate_commissions.product_id WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM referrals;
SELECT referral_id, referral_link, referral_date FROM referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, affiliate_name, email FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 3;
SELECT affiliate_id, commission_amount, commission_date FROM commissions WHERE commission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT affiliate_name, payout_amount FROM affiliates JOIN payouts ON affiliates.affiliate_id = payouts.affiliate_id WHERE payouts.payout_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT referral_id, affiliate_id, referral_link FROM referrals WHERE affiliate_id = 3;
SELECT affiliate_name, email, commission_amount FROM affiliates INNER JOIN commissions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = commissions.affiliate_id;
SELECT affiliate_name, email, SUM(commission_amount) AS total_commission FROM affiliates INNER JOIN commissions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = commissions.affiliate_id GROUP BY affiliate_name, email;
SELECT affiliate_name, email, commission_date FROM affiliates INNER JOIN commissions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = commissions.affiliate_id WHERE commission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
